name: To Do: Break Down
description:
"What's next on my to-do list... Break down? As in emotionally or-"

TO-DO: BREAK DOWN is a point-and click adventure game that aims to educate players about the role that cognitive flexibility plays in our lives.

Follow Moxie through their day as they attempt to juggle chores, academics, and hobbies. Help them with tasks like feeding their pet gecko, cleaning their bathroom, doing the laundry that's been sitting there for a week, catching up on labs, and dealing with noisy neighbors.

Finish that to-do list before it finishes you!

This game was developed as part of our undergraduate thesis at Ateneo de Manila University. We would like to thank DISCS, our playtesters, and our advisers Sir Neithan, Ma’am Jen, and Ma’am Therese for making this project possible.

If you would like to read our manuscript for the thesis and get more insights on the development process, feel free to contact us!

Developed by Dirk Reyes, Julia Santos, and Andie Tsai
